title: LISTEN: The Debate - Chris Kamara and Gordon Strachan
description: Listen to the latest edition of The Debate as Chris Kamara and Gordon Strachan joined David Prutton to discuss all the big talking points.
content: The Sky Sports pundit and former Scotland boss offer their take on Alexis Sanchez and Henrikh Mkhitaryan's proposed swap deal and Ross Barkley's switch from boyhood club Everton to champions Chelsea.There was also talk about the chasing pack's attempt to keep pace with the spending power of the Premier League's top six as well as the state of play at Newcastle United as their proposed takeover was put on hold.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
